original_text: Of the firstborn of the children of Israel took he the money; a thousand three hundred and threescore and five shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary:
korean_text: 곧 이스라엘 자손의 처음 태어난 자에게서 받은 돈이 성소의 세겔로 천삼백육십오 세겔이라

sentences.original_text: Of the firstborn of the children of Israel
a thousand three hundred and threescore and five shekels,
after the shekel of the sanctuary:
